spec_data.Name: pmpu
spec_data.Description:
Push Me Pull You is a graphical interface for a distributed version control
system. Currently it contains proof-of-concept support the hg , git, bzr and
darcs systems.
spec_data.Signature: RSA/SHA256, Fri 28 Jul 2017 10:24:10 PM EDT, Key ID f55e7430f5282ee4
spec_data.Summary: GUI for a distributed version control systems
